explanation: [0-0] On a snowy day, a blonde woman kneels in front of a yellow house with a blonde girl beside her, a man and a woman stand at the door. The man is holding a purple suitcase in his right hand with an angry expression, his left hand resting on the shoulder of the woman next to him.

[0-5] Then the man throws the purple suitcase in front of the blonde woman, the blonde woman quickly hugs the little girl, and then the man points to the left side of the screen with a ferocious expression. The pink box says "Ignore" and the blue box says "Help them", then a finger clicks on the blue box.
